reasoning: New equipment tracking table following design mockup. Existing DataTable and StatusBadge components can be reused, but design differs from current EquipmentPage implementation. Location field and approval status display need clarification.

scope.notes: Frontend-only change. May need to modify EquipmentPage.tsx or create new component, add location field support, update filters to match design. Existing Equipment type and API already present.

integrations.notes: All patterns exist in codebase. DataTable component supports sorting, StatusBadge exists for badges, Material-UI provides filter components.

infrastructure.notes: Frontend-only feature. No database schema changes anticipated (Location might be existing field or derived data). No Docker or config changes needed.

knowledge.notes: Codebase has existing EquipmentPage with DataTable, StatusBadge, filters, and pagination. Design shows different column structure and filter approach but uses same UI patterns.

concerns: Design differs from existing EquipmentPage - unclear if this replaces or augments
Location field shown in design but not in current Equipment type
Approval Status column shows descriptive text (e.g., 'Approved by John Doe') - data source unclear
Need to clarify relationship to existing equipment functionality
risk.notes: Main risk is ambiguous requirements. Design mockup shows features not in current implementation. Requirements phase captured minimal detail.

validation_recommendations.reasoning: New table component with sorting and filtering requires unit tests for logic and integration tests for rendering/interactions. No security-sensitive operations. Frontend-only change requires no staging deployment.
